content: Nope... it's not spam. As many of you already know, PBS does many pieces about the military and they have partnered with us time and again to get the information directly from the largest gathering of Servicemembers (past and presently serving) anywhere in the world. This is legit. "I know you believe you understand what you think I said, but I am not sure you realize that what you heard is not what I meant." - Oscar Wilde
